name: neon-mint
title: NeonMint
desc: Is a modern, minimalist template crafted for developers and digital creatives.
article:
NeonMint - Quick Guide

ð¯ What is it?

NeonMint is a modern and minimalist template with a dark aesthetic and mint green accents. Perfect for portfolios, dashboards, or tech landing pages.

ð ï¸ Technology Stack

Framework: Astro v5.6.1

UI Library: Preact v10.26.2

Styling: TailwindCSS v4.0.8

Icons: astro-icon v1.1.5

Syntax Highlighting: PrismJS v1.30.0

Animations: tailwindcss-animated v2.0.0

Analytics: @vercel/speed-insights v1.2.0


â¨ Features

Static site, fast loading

Modern styling with Tailwind

Dark mode

TypeScript support

Built-in analytics and SEO tools

github.name: NeonMint
github.description: is a modern, minimalist web template created for developers, designers, and digital creatives. This project aims to offer an elegant and functional visual experience, combining a dark-toned aesthetic with mint green accents to highlight content without distractions.
